TELBOT_LIGHT: Controlling your light from the SmartMirror
TELBOT_LIGHT_TURNING_ON: Turning ON the light for you
TELBOT_LIGHT_TURNING_OFF: Turning OFF the light for you
TELBOT_LIGHT_SPEFICY: Do you want the light to be ON or OFF ? Please specify.
TELBOT_LIGHT_NOT_INSTALLED: Ops! You need to install MMM-Yeelight before you can use the command.
NO_LIGHTS_AVAILABLE: No lights available on the network.
